title: Get review info of ad groups

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: adgroup_ids
parameters.description: The list of ad group IDs. Currently, we support a maximum of 20 ad group IDs in the request.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: The response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: The response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

fields.name: ad_review_map
fields.description: The bi-dimensional structure for the review data at the ad level. The key for the first dimension is adgroup_id . The key for the second dimension is ad_id .

fields.name: ad_id
fields.description: The ad ID. Note : For Smart+ ad groups with a partial or complete review failure ( review_status within ad_group_review_map is PART_AVAILABLE or UNAVAILABLE ), the ad_id within ad_review_map does not represent a real ad ID and cannot be used with /ad/review_info/ to fetch ad-level review details. Instead, treat each ad_id as a material within the Smart+ Campaign. To understand review failures, examine the reject_info within ad_review_map returned by /adgroup/review_info/ . Afterwards, update the Smart+ Campaign accordingly via /campaign/spc/update/ .

fields.name: is_approved
fields.description: Whether the ad has been approved or not.

fields.name: review_status
fields.description: The ad review status. Enum values： ALL_AVAILABLE : The ad has been reviewed and can be delivered. PART_AVAILABLE : The ad has been reviewed and can only be delivered to some of the specified targeting countries. UNAVAILABLE : The ad has been reviewed and cannot be delivered.

fields.name: appeal_status To-be-deprecated
fields.description: Ad appeal status. Note : The value of this field will always be null.

fields.name: forbidden_placements
fields.description: The placements that failed the review. For enum values, see Enumeration - Placement .

fields.name: forbidden_ages
fields.description: Age groups that failed the review. For enum values, see Enumeration - Age Group .

fields.name: forbidden_locations
fields.description: The targeted regions that failed the review. For enum values, see Appendix - Location codes .

fields.name: forbidden_operation_systems
fields.description: The audience operating systems that failed the review. For enum values, see Enumeration - Operating Systems .

fields.name: last_audit_time
fields.description: Note : The value of this field will always be null. The last time when the ad was reviewed.

fields.name: reject_info
fields.description: Details about the rejection.

fields.name: suggestion
fields.description: The review suggestion.

fields.name: reasons
fields.description: List of rejection reasons.

fields.name: forbidden_ages
fields.description: Age groups that failed the review. For enum values, see Enumeration - Age Group .

fields.name: forbidden_locations
fields.description: The targeted regions that failed the review. For enum values, see Appendix - Location codes .

fields.name: forbidden_placements
fields.description: The placements that failed the review. For enum values, see Enumeration - Placement .

fields.name: content_info
fields.description: The content of the ad that has been reviewed.

fields.name: image_content
fields.description: The image content.

fields.name: image_id
fields.description: The ID of the image that has been reviewed.

fields.name: video_content
fields.description: The video content that has been reviewed.

fields.name: video_id
fields.description: The ID of the video that is being reviewed.

fields.name: text_content
fields.description: The text.

fields.name: content_type
fields.description: The type of the content that has been reviewed， Enum values： MODE_STRING ， MODE_IMAGE ， MODE_VIDEO , MODE_CAROUSEL_MUSIC (Music in the Carousel Ads).

fields.name: carousel_music_content
fields.description: Returned when content_type is MODE_CAROUSEL_MUSIC . The content of the music in the Carousel Ads that has been reviewed.

fields.name: music_id
fields.description: The ID of the piece of music used in the Carousel Ads.

fields.name: ad_group_review_map
fields.description: The review data at the ad group level, organized by adgroup_id . The key for the first dimension is adgroup_id .

fields.name: adgroup_id
fields.description: Ad group ID.

fields.name: is_approved
fields.description: Whether the ad group has been approved.

fields.name: review_status
fields.description: The ad group review status. Enum values: ALL_AVAILABLE : The ad group has been reviewed and all ads in the ad group can be delivered. PART_AVAILABLE : The ad group has been reviewed and only some of the ads in the ad group can be delivered. UNAVAILABLE : The ad group has been reviewed and all ads in the ad group cannot be delivered. Note : For Smart+ ad groups with a partial or complete review failure ( review_status within ad_group_review_map is PART_AVAILABLE or UNAVAILABLE ), the ad_id within ad_review_map does not represent a real ad ID and cannot be used with /ad/review_info/ to fetch ad-level review details. Instead, treat each ad_id as a material within the Smart+ Campaign. To understand review failures, examine the reject_info within ad_review_map returned by /adgroup/review_info/ . Afterwards, update the Smart+ Campaign accordingly via /campaign/spc/update/ .

fields.name: appeal_status
fields.description: Ad group appeal status. For enum values, see Enumeration - Ad Group Review Appeal Status . To appeal the rejection of an ad group, call /adgroup/appeal/ . Then this field will be set to APPEALING (Appeal in progress).

fields.name: forbidden_placements
fields.description: The placements that failed the review. For enum values, see Enumeration - Placement .

fields.name: forbidden_ages
fields.description: The audience age ranges that failed the review. For enum values, see Enumeration - Age Groups .

fields.name: forbidden_locations
fields.description: The targeted locations that failed the review. For enum values, see Appendix - Location codes .

fields.name: forbidden_operation_systems
fields.description: The audience operating systems that failed the review. For enum values, see Enumeration - Operating System .

fields.name: last_audit_time
fields.description: Note : The value of this field will be the actual review time only when the ad group has been rejected. The last time when the ad group was reviewed (UTC+0), in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS . Example: 2023-01-01 00:00:00 .

fields.name: contain_rejected_ads
fields.description: Whether ads in this ad group have been rejected.

fields.name: reject_info
fields.description: Details about the rejection.

fields.name: suggestion
fields.description: The review suggestion.

fields.name: reasons
fields.description: List of rejection reasons

fields.name: forbidden_ages
fields.description: Age groups that failed the review. For enum values, see Enumeration - Age Group .

fields.name: forbidden_locations
fields.description: The targeted regions that failed the review. For enum values, see Appendix - Location codes .

fields.name: forbidden_placements
fields.description: The placements that failed the review. For enum values, see Enumeration - Placement .

fields.name: content_info
fields.description: The content of the ad that has been reviewed.

fields.name: image_content
fields.description: The image content.

fields.name: image_id
fields.description: The ID of the image that has been reviewed.

fields.name: video_content
fields.description: The video content that has been reviewed.

fields.name: video_id
fields.description: The ID of the video that is being reviewed.

fields.name: text_content
fields.description: The text.

fields.name: content_type
fields.description: The type of the content that has been reviewed， Enum values： MODE_STRING ， MODE_IMAGE ， MODE_VIDEO , MODE_CAROUSEL_MUSIC (Music in the Carousel Ads).

fields.name: carousel_music_content
fields.description: Returned when content_type is MODE_CAROUSEL_MUSIC . The content of the music in the Carousel Ads that has been reviewed.

fields.name: music_id
fields.description: The ID of the piece of music used in the Carousel Ads.
